data.title: Animal Crossing: New Leaf
data.meta_description: For Animal Crossing: New Leaf on the 3DS, a GameFAQs message board topic titled "HHD Link".
data.text:
The_Sacred_Buns 7 years ago#1

Was just wondering what exactly does it do? I mean I know it unlocks HHD giant items for purchase in NL. But apparently it's a one time deal so it just reads the game and then unlocks all of the available items? Just wondering if it'll continue to update more as I progress in HHD? I just bought HHD yesterday so there wasn't much unlocked in that game.

46-12-25

3DS FC: 4141-5773-3886

Fox5409 7 years ago#2

To my knowledge it just unlocks the giant items in the catalog and mails you a house model. I don't think progressing in HHD unlocks anything further, the link option is gone from my title screen and I didn't get too far in HHD.
